pullrequest.title: Send message to subscribers only once per connection

content.raw: The reason `ThreadedMultiPubSub` prints only one message is that once the first publisher has been declared, the topic is considered to be locally advertised and when the second call to `TopicManager::Advertise` is done, `Publication::GetLocallyAdvertised` returns `true` which leads to `ConnectionManager::Advertise` not being called. This pull request does not affect this behavior.
